author: Xerbutri
title: De Haan Fabriek
intro: I discovered this location by coincidence and visited it in April 2007. It is really vandalized and there is not much to see. Above all it is situated in someones backyard.
history: There is little historical information to be found. I did discover it used to be a machine factory. It was abandoned somewhere in 1999 or 2000. In May 2007 there was a fire in this building.
